I like it, maybe slightly less than the newer wolfenstein games but it's good. I'm not a big fan of the first bioshock games at all so it took me a long time to get around to this one. Their art style gets to me a little bit but this one had mostly cool stuff. There were a few glitches where I had to reset the game - almost all having to do with the skyhook which doesn't really add much fun to the game imo.
Great game, great story, would recommend

Mind blowing story, well developed and unforgettable main characters and immersive gameplay 10/10
Honestly the best storytelling experience ever. Nothing beats it. Simply amazing.

Incredible story, very fun gameplay and an amazing vibrant city. If you've ever played Bioshock before, I highly recommend this game as well as the season pass. If you've never played a Bioshock game before, this game will still make sense, however the DLC's may not. I would recommend holding off on playing the season pass until you play the first Bioshock. A summary is available for the game but playing through the first game would make the DLC's better than just listening to a summary of the events. Onto the main game, I love pretty much everything about it, the gameplay is just as fun as the previous 2 Bioshocks and the settings in my opinion is 10x better than Rapture. I won't say that much about the story as it's something you should experience for yourself but I will say that it's an incredible and intricate story that will blow your mind.

In my view the most awesome story line of a game ever! Fighting joy is not in the quality of Doom but good - however, the story is really impressively good, felt like playing through a good movie with good story on multiple levels, so if you enjoy a 20-30h story line movie, I couldn't imagine a better one.

Interesting FPS to play, but it a bit short in my oppinion. Story of the game is a bit confusing but exciting. Graphics are decent. Soundtrack is ok. I give it 8/10.

Bioshock Infinite reminds of Resident Evil 5 and Fallout 4 in the sense that it's not a Bioshock game in spirit but only in name. Now don't get me wrong it's a damn fun FPS and I enjoyed my time with campaign. I thought the Vigors were more fun to use then Plasmids and the city of Colombia is on par with Rapture in my opinion. I'd say I got my moneys worth and would recommend this to any lover of the FPS genre

(10/10) Esse jogo Ã© um grande exemplo de que uma obra prima completa pode existir, personagens incriveis, historia marcante, gameplay extremamente divertida e mundo super interessante e bem desenvolvido. Conhecemos esse universo controlando Booker DeWitt na companhia da incrÃ­vel Elizabeth (MELHOR COMPANHEIRA DOS GAMES), exploramos a grande Columbia, um dos melhores planos de fundo pra um jogo, uma cidade aparentemente perfeita mais que se revela o cumulo da podridÃ£o humana, onde a desigualdade Ã© explicita, o racismo Ã© praticado sem puniÃ§Ã£o alguma e o fanatismo religioso Ã© intrÃ­nseco na populaÃ§Ã£o, onde um aproveitador e vilÃ£o da historia Zachary Comstock, se aproveita da fÃ© cega para se denominar profeta. Com um dos melhores enredos se nÃ£o o melhor da historia dos videogames, Bioshock infinite te recompensa com uma grande experiÃªncia digna da serie Bioshock, com direito a um grande plot twist na histÃ³ria, que te farÃ¡ pensar e jogar novamente para uma compreensÃ£o total, difÃ­cilmente vocÃ© vai esquecer esse universo. "UMA OBRA PRIMA COMPLETA E DELICIOSA DE EXPERIÃŠNCIAR" 10/10 - Meu jogo favorito da vida!

Y que esperar de este Bioshock, simplemente espectacular! Historia excepcional, mecÃ¡nicas un poco diferentes a los anteriores tÃ­tulos, pero siempre con esa escencia que caractariza a esta saga de juegos, recomendadÃ­simo aun asÃ­ si no jugaste a los dos anteriores.

Linear game but interesting in its own way. I like it's story more than the mechanical changes from bioshock 1/2. Abilities are much more impactful and yet I can't help feel like there's something missing. One of the more interesting things about the game is how much the feeling of it changes as you progress. Bioshock starts with jumping you into a world feeling of insanity and darkness. where as infinite feels more like you are the driving force behind the chaos and insanity. I love this game for what it is. It took me a while to bother to play it due to its initial feeling not immediately feeling like the same old bioshock game I expected.

ahhh que recuerdos me dio volver a jugarlo dÃ©spues de unos 4 aÃ±os y ahora darme cuenta de tantos detalles que se me pasaron de largo desde las increible banda sonora, la jugabilidad que en mi caso me re encanta, y la historia que igual en los dlc y final se una con rapture; asi que 10/10
Juegazo todavia no lo termino pero es muy entretenido
Masterpiece.
Juste wow, jamais vu un aussi bon jeu depuis Half-Life 2 !

I enjoyed this game a lot. it differs from the original in how it focuses more on comboing weapons and tonics more than using surroundings. the story can be fun and the skylines are great. I see a lot of critisism and it is well deserved, doesn't come close to the original bioshock and the ending can seem very annoying, like they were trying to do a bioshock 1 ending. still I found enjoyment and if you haven't played it don't sell it too short.
The best game ever with bonus games so goog i will can play it again and you learn what happend ther

Truly a masterpiece!! Provides the perfect conclusion to a perfect trilogy. From the improved gameplay and a story that has you hooked until the credits roll, infinite wraps up one of the best gaming experiences ive ever had. The ending has me shook even weeks after i finished it and i dont think ill ever experience an ending like that in gaming for a long time. Infinite delivers on all fronts and i give it my highest recommendation possible! 11/10

Ich bin mit BioShock Infintite in die BioShock-Reihe eingestiegen und habe mir dann im Nachgang auch gleich die ersten beiden Spiele geholt. Besonders angetan haben es mir die Story und die Charaktere von Infinite, die mich mit Blick auf die Wendungen und das Ende Ã¼berzeugen konnten. Hinsichtlich der Story eines der besten Spiele, die ich bisher gespielt habe.
Im Gegensatz zu den ersten beiden Teilen spielt Infinite allerdings nicht unter Wasser, sondern in den Wolken der Stadt Columbia. Als Booker DeWitt erhalten wir den Auftrag eine Person Namens Elizabeth zu retten, was sich allerdings leichter anhÃ¶rt, als es letzten Endes ist. Ãœber die Story hinweg erfahren wir mehr Ã¼ber Elizabeth und Booker und schlussendlich auch, was es mit ihrer Rettung auf sich hat. Das ein oder andere Fragezeichen bleibt allerdings auch noch nach dem ersten Durchlauf bestehen, was in meinen Augen den Wiederspielwert noch einmal steigert. Gleiches gilt fÃ¼r die beiden Dlcs, die mir ebenfalls sehr gut gefallen haben und uns in das Setting der ersten beiden Teile entfÃ¼hren.

Der gewÃ¤hlte "Grafikstil" gefÃ¤llt mir ebenfalls sehr gut und steht ein StÃ¼ck weit im Widerspruch zu dem von Rassismus, ReligiÃ¶sen Fanatismus und Ausbeutung geprÃ¤gten Setting der Stadt Columbia. 

Das Kampfsystem bietet Dank dem Zugriff auf die FÃ¤higkeiten von Booker und Elizabeth (sofern sie euch gerade begleitet) eine gute Abwechslung zu den vorhandenen Waffen und ergÃ¤nzt das Ganze noch einmal.

Einziger Kritikpunkt ist die fehlende MÃ¶glichkeit selbstÃ¤ndig zu speichern.

Alles in allem kann ich das Spiel mit Blick auf die gelungene Story und die Charaktere allerdings nur empfehlen.

The game is so different from the rest of the bioshock series, it appears to be almost an entirely unique game. The narrative is nice, but the gameplay leaves room to be desired, it is more or less just waves upon waves of enemies, some unique but overall just an FPS unlinke the first game. Unfortunately, I cannot beat the game due to a glitch that got me stuck permenantly in place, reloading the check point, or the save/chapter does nothing to help.

tell a good story, that's enough.

over-rated crap, maybe you'll enjoy it if you're still a teenager. It's like hollywood made a game; pretentious 2deep4u story with racial antagonizing, bastardization of religious themes, and forgettable, shallow characters. Even the environments are copy-pasted all over.

It's only saving grace is the combat, which even then is nothing special given our modern industry. Finished in 7 hours and glad I'm past it. terrible terrible terrible, doesn't deserve the amount of positive reviews it has.
Melhores historias

It's a classic. It's art style still holds up to today. If you still don't like it, there are ways of fixing it with shaders and light graphical tweaks. Really fun, still good, uh... Textures don't look as good as I remember.
